summary: this mod removes the conditions on perks so that you can get your favorite perk right at the begining
descriptionHtml:
[color=#999999]
[size=5]                           [/size][size=6]   [/size][/color][u][b][font=Verdana][size=6]Perk Conditions Removed[/size][/font][/b][/u]
[color=#6d9eeb][center]
Highly Recommend This Mod for people who has 
played the game for quite a long time but if you want obviously
you can use it.[/center][center][b][size=5][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#1e84cc]This Mod Removes the conditions on perks so now you don't have to wait to get the perk you want[/color][/font][color=#1e84cc] [/color][/size][/b][/center][/color]   [center][color=#999999]This should work with all the dlc's Fine But it doesn't change anything on the Vampire Lord/ Were Wolf perks
hope use all fave this mod if you like and subscribe thanks :) 
[/color][color=#b6b6b6]
this is a good mod if your just messing around in the game if you've played it a million times before [/color][/center]
[size=5][color=#980000]  [/color][color=#1e84cc]This mod wont work properly if you have any other perk tree related Downloads[/color][/size]
         [center][color=#666666]  [/color][color=#cccccc] [/color][color=#f4f4f4]Other Useful Tips.[/color]
[color=#999999][size=4]The Mod Works Fine with Mod Organizer Or Nexus Mod Manager
[/size][/color][color=#1e84cc][size=3]I[/size][/color][color=#1e84cc]f the Mod doesn't work for you try putting it right to the bottom of your Mod load Order but so far it works for me[/color]
[size=4]Notes[/size]
[color=#00ffff]Please No rude comments about this being a cheat mod[/color][color=#999999] i have mentioned this once before no point in arguments..
sorry if this sound's cheeky/rude but I had a bit of trouble with this when i had put this mod on my steam account.
[/color][i][color=#999999][size=3]I may Update the Mod if it receives enough downloads so it works with all the Dlc's
[/size][/color][/i][size=3][i][color=#999999]Were-Wolf and Vampire Lord Perks
[/color]
[/i][/size][color=#00ffff][size=5][font=Lucida Sans Unicode](If i have missed Anything Please let me know)[/font]

[/size][/color](Known Incompatible Mods)[/center][center][color=#00ffff]Skyrim Redone
[/color][color=#b6b6b6]"Let me know if you have mods that this mod doesn't work with if you can Thanks"[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]
(Mods That Should Work With the mod)[/color]

[color=#00ffff]Skyrim Community Uncapper[/color]
[color=#b6b6b6]"Let me know if you have mods that this mod does work with if you can Thanks"
[/color][/center]
author: InvincibleGamer
